}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:52.059
    | text      = a little speech and throwing some shade around and then Alex speaking his piece.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:59.059
    | text      = And very importantly, the aftermath is going very poorly with the governor of the island
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:05.059
    | text      = wanting to do nothing but blame it on global warming and other things that just happened
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:10.059
    | text      = to pop into his head.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:12.220
    | text      = When asked about it today, as he was getting into a car, perhaps coming home from the beach
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:20.580
    | text      = where he has been spending a great deal of time, crooked Joe Biden, the most incompetent
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:25.899
    | text      = president in the history of our country with a laugh and a smile said he had no comment
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:30.820
    | text      = on the death and the tragedy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:33.580
    | text      = To say no comment is oftentimes fine, but to be smiling when you say it, especially
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:39.580
    | text      = against such a tragedy as this is absolutely horrible and unacceptable.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:46.340
    | text      = It is a disgraceful thing that Joe Biden refuses to help or comment on the tragedy in Maui,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:55.299
    | text      = just as he refused to help or comment on the train derailment in East Palestine, Ohio,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:02.039
    | text      = for a very, very long time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:04.220
    | text      = In any event, hopefully everyone will be able to pull together so that a horrible situation
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:10.299
    | text      = does not get even worse to the families affected.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:13.860
    | text      = I give you my love and sympathy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:16.500
    | text      = Nothing can ever replace your loved ones, but you will always have the memories and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:21.240
    | text      = will feel their great love surrounding and embracing you together.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:25.620
    | text      = We will continue to carry their legacy forward and I love you all very much.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:32.299
    | text      = Thank you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:33.299
    | text      = Heartfelt, powerful presidential message from our real president.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:37.580
    | text      = Biden was asked about it and said, no comment.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:40.860
    | text      = Our hearts go out to people who were sending aid vector blocking aid coming in from private
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:45.440
    | text      = citizens and operating in federal aid.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:46.980
    | text      = The governor on video announced they're going to steal the property and turn it into a smart
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:51.659
    | text      = city with Bill Gates.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:52.860
    | text      = OK.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:53.860
    | text      = You cannot make this stuff up, except you just did.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:57.980
    | text      = Yes, you 100 percent can.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:59.200
    | text      = I will say that it is maybe a fair criticism that Joe Biden hasn't talked enough about
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:04.059
    | text      = the wildfires in Maui in the past days.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:06.279
    | text      = But what Alex and Trump are doing is playing games about a tragedy to score political points.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:10.700
    | text      = It's just obvious.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:12.379
    | text      = Let me read to you from a statement put out by the White House, quote, Jill and I send
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:16.539
    | text      = our deepest condolences to the families of those who lost loved ones in the wildfires
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:20.700
    | text      = in Maui and our prayers are with those who have seen their homes, businesses and communities
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:25.379
    | text      = destroyed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:26.500
    | text      = That statement was released on August 9th, almost a week before this episode of Alex's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:31.299
    | text      = show was being recorded.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:33.379
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:34.379
    | text      = Alex doesn't care about the fires or the people impacted by them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:37.139
    | text      = And to put it more sharply, he doesn't care whether Biden talks about them or not.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:41.340
    | text      = What he cares about is following along with his team.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:43.860
    | text      = And he sees his team saying Biden is ignoring the fire.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:46.379
    | text      = So Alex dutifully repeats that message and exaggerates it further, making up shit about
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:50.820
    | text      = Biden blocking aid and what have you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:53.139
    | text      = Alex is a follower.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:54.580
    | text      = He's not the tip of the spear rooting out lies and corruption.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:57.379
    | text      = He's just a demagogue spouting the bullshit his strongman leader says to with zero concern
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:02.120
    | text      = for whether it's true or not, so long as it helps his team and hurts the other side.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:06.559
    | text      = The governor of Hawaii, Josh Green, did not announce that they're going to seize all the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:10.380
    | text      = land affected by the fires and make smart cities or some bullshit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:14.119
    | text      = What happened is that Green spoke out and gave a warning about scams that people often
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:18.440
    | text      = try to run after tragedies, exploiting desperation and the public response to it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:24.019
    | text      = Governor Green explored options with his attorney general about halting any sales of properties
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:28.500
    | text      = that had been damaged because residents had reported being approached by people who didn't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:32.779
    | text      = live on the island, who were posing as real estate agents and seeking to buy their property
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:37.140
    | text      = naturally for less than it would be worth under other circumstances.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:41.619
    | text      = This kind of predatory behavior might be considered an attempt at land grabbing, but what the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:46.859
    | text      = governor did was speak out against it and seek legal means of protecting the public
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:51.400
    | text      = from it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:53.259
    | text      = Green did make a comment about unspecified areas of land that he said the state would
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:57.099
    | text      = buy before allowing private outside developers to come in and poach it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:02.019
    | text      = I can see how that could be seen by some people as an instance of state land grabbing, but
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:06.279
    | text      = I disagree.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:07.619
    | text      = I don't pretend to be an expert on it or anything, but I lived in Hawaii for a bit as a kid and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:11.740
    | text      = I can say that the public attitude toward outside developers is intensely hostile.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:17.140
    | text      = I can't even really express to you how much it was instilled in me, even as a third grader,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:21.819
    | text      = how much damage had been done by the big Japanese companies and the howlies like me coming in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:27.539
    | text      = and buying land, developing it into things like exotic resorts and exclusive golf clubs.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:33.500
    | text      = These developments didn't serve the public.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:35.380
    | text      = In fact, locals are largely excluded from these luxuries either because they can't afford
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:39.579
    | text      = the golf course or because they don't need to stay at a resort, they live there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:44.500
    | text      = The developments do, however, attract vacationers, which attracts businesses aimed at vacationers
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:49.819
    | text      = and specifically not aimed at locals.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:52.619
    | text      = You see this distinction very clearly if you go to Honolulu and walk around Waikiki Beach,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:56.779
    | text      = that area, you see that glut of fancy restaurants and flashy shops, but then just walk six blocks
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:02.460
    | text      = towards the interior of the island and the picture changes entirely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:06.339
    | text      = The capital investment in the tourist area does not help the people who live in Hawaii.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:10.660
    | text      = It solidly works against their quality of life and raises property values to the point
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:16.099
